description:
Introducing the official mobile app for everyone involved in the New Zealand Cricket Community.

Cricket Central is the official free iOS app for the New Zealand cricket community, featuring fixtures, ladders, results and stats from PlayHQ. Fans can favourite players, teams and competitions, while logged-in participants get their fixtures synced to their schedule with instant match updates.

Sports in New Zealand just levelled up with betcha! Here to shake things up and make sports more social, fun, and engaging. It’s a fresh take on wagering that’s built for today, helping a new generation of bettors get in the game with confidence.
Whether it’s the track, the field, or the Octagon – betcha is your all-in-one app for racing and sports betting. Fast, easy, and packed with cool features, we’ve got thousands of markets across all local, trans-Tasman and global codes.

Multi Builder
Multiply the excitement and stack your legs with Multi Builder, copy trending multis straight from the feed, and track every play live with Multi Tracker. See how each leg’s landing and watch the stats roll in – no app-hopping required.

Toolbox
Give yourself the punting edge with betcha’s Toolbox, your daily exclusive features needed to get any betting job done. You have the freedom to choose which race, track or sport to apply your exclusive tools. Odds Boost lets you up the ante and get more back from your bets. Insurance tools like SGM Cover and Multi Rescue give you a fallback options if things don’t go to plan.

Bet Social
Link up with like-minded punters or rally the crew together. With Bet Social, you can chat, share bets, and banter – all in one place. Create a profile, follow tipsters, jump on trending bets, or team up with your mates and build a Pot. Got a hot tip from someone else? Claim it as your own – we won’t tell.
Stay sharp and entertained with The Playbook – your go-to for tips, hot takes, match analysis, and original content. All killer, no filler.

From the track to the turf, the court to the cage – betcha brings you the best banter, tips, and markets across every code:
- Horse Racing
- Greyhound & Harness Racing
- NRL
- Rugby Union
- MMA, UFC
- NBA / WNBA
- NFL
- Tennis
- Cricket
- MLB
- Esports
- Football / Soccer
- Motorsports
- ...and stacks more.
 
Above all else, we’ll always encourage responsible betting with a suite of Safer Betting options for you to choose from. We will also give back to New Zealand sports and racing communities to fuel the future, from grassroots and beyond.
Explore further:
Safer Betting Tools: Learn More [https://entaingroup.com.au/safer-gambling/?]
Safer Gambling Tips: Stay in Control [https://entaingroup.com.au/safer-gambling/?]
Need Support? Contact the Gambling Helpline at 0800 654 655 or text 8006 for free, confidential assistance, available 24/7.

Enjoy more ways to multi with TAB. 

Same Game Multi (SGM) For You. Personalised pre-built SGM's, based on your favourite markets. Try SGM For You! Available on eligible NRL, AFL, NBA, NFL and Premier League events in the ‘For You’ tab.  
 
Explore SGM’s selected for you. What you get served is just for you to suit your preferences. You can find these by visiting the 'For You' tab within Same Game Multi on eligible events. Pick your desired odds range and choose from the list of bets built for you. 

Power up your multi. Mix your sport and racing with a Same Race Multi Multi! SRMs can now be added as a leg of a multi with other multi eligible bet types.  

And, Face or Touch ID makes it faster and safer to access your account.

Sky Sport Now gives you streaming access to unrivalled sport content, including All Blacks, NRL, Super Rugby, ICC Events, Formula 1®, Premier League, A-League, State of Origin, ANZ Premiership & Silver Ferns netball, Supercars Championship, IPL, NBA, PGA Tour, LPGA, and so much more.


You can watch Sky Sport Now on a range of devices including selected smart TVs, mobile phones, tablets and laptops.

 
With a Sky Sport Now Pass you can:

 - Get instant access and cancel any time

 - Stream on your TV or on the go

 - Watch from live or start

 - Catch up with on-demand replays, highlights and sports shows

Experience the thrill of Formula 1® with F1 TV Access. Relive race archives, enjoy exclusive shows, and dive into detailed data, all from your favorite devices.

With F1 TV Access, you can:
•        Get full exclusive access to Live Timing Data, Maps and Analysis
•        Watch F1 shows and documentaries
•        Explore over 2000 hours of historic race archives
•        Enjoy a premium ad-free experience 

For more information on F1 TV content available in your country please visit the F1 website.

For help with F1TV, please visit: https://support.f1.tv/s/?language=en_US

If you subscribe via iTunes:
Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current billing period. Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the rate of the selected plan.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of use: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/f1-apps-terms-of-use
Privacy policy: https://account.formula1.com/#/en/privacy-policy

The Official App of Golf New Zealand – Offers Golf NZ members access to their golfing scores, profile, friends' activity, and relevant golfing notifications.


Golf NZ features:

- Monitor your handicap and scoring history over time. See which scores are counting toward your handicap index.
- View detailed hole-by-hole scoring record for each golfing round 
- Follow your friends with peer review of golfing score history
- Receive notifications such as handicap updates, friend activity, comments on scores, and general updates from Golf NZ and your club
- Edit your profile details and upload your profile picture
- Get a scorecard and enter your scores through the app
- Members and visitors can search and book a game of golf
- My Bookings area for club members to track their upcoming booking schedule
- Search tee time availability in your preferred area at the nearest club facility offering the DotGolf tee booking service
- Search for daily golf specials being offered at clubs
- Easily book your friends and/or visitors to the club, and secure and pay for your booking
- Receive booking message notifications
- Check-in and register at a golf club- Pay your green fees at participating clubs

HOW TO USE FISH AI:


1) Answer fishing questions to customize predictions specifically for you.


2) Get daily personalized fishing spot suggestions up to 10 days in advance.


3) Consult the AI-powered Fish Coach anytime for expert fishing tips, strategies, and advice.


4) Log and rank your catches to track your progress.


Fish AI isn't another complicated fishing app depending on manual data from other anglers. Instead, we leverage science-based insights, professional expertise, and proven fish behavior to deliver precise, reliable predictions. Our mission is to empower every angler, helping you catch more fish and enjoy every moment on the water. Patience and the right tools are essential—Fish AI equips you with the critical information to enhance your fishing success!


If you have any ideas or questions, please email us at support@fishai.app

NOTE: We do not condone illegal or unauthorized fishing activities. Any and all recommendations should be viewed as purely informational, please consult with local authorities and do your own research before fishing at the water.

*PREDICTION RESULTS REQUIRE A SUBSCRIPTION.

Experience Formula 1 like never before with our official app!

Your one-stop hub keeps you updated with the latest F1 news, thrilling highlights, race results, action-packed videos, real-time results and detailed schedules.

Stay ahead of the curve with:
•	The latest F1 news and expert technical analysis
•	Race weekend schedules and real-time results
•	Manage your F1 Fantasy team 
•	Free Leaderboard with live timings

For F1 TV Access® subscribers, unlock a world of exclusive content including:

F1® TV puts you in the driving seat – with race highlights, live timing and live streaming (available only in certain countries). You can subscribe to F1® TV with an annual or monthly subscription. 

Subscriptions renew automatically, unless you turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours beforehand. You can turn off auto-renew at any time through your iTunes account.

Featured by Apple as 'The best app for golfers'! Join millions of golfers using 18Birdies to shoot lower scores with the help of our breakthrough game improvement tools. Get incredibly accurate distances for how far to hit every shot at courses worldwide. View 3D Green Maps to help you read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  See how far every shot you hit goes during a round and track performance & progress with a digital scorecard. You'll even get suggestions on how to improve based on how your stats compare to other golfers in your skill level. Create tournaments for groups of friends, get swing tips and share your love of golf with friends.  

Using 18Birdies is like having a Tour-level caddy and GPS rangefinder in your pocket. Play every hole like a pro with accurate “Plays Like" distances based on elevation change, wind, rain, temperature, and more.

Looking to improve your game? Upload a video of your swing to AI Coach and get instant feedback on what swing faults to focus on with custom video tips walking you through exactly how to fix those swing faults.  It's like a coach in your pocket, anytime you need swing advice AI Coach is there to help. 

Make the most out of your practice sessions with 18Birdies. Compare stats with other players in your skill level to help you figure out how to improve faster.

FREE FEATURES:

-GPS RANGEFINDER: Find your distance from anywhere on the course.
-STATS & ROUND HISTORY: Track your stats in a few taps and view all your past rounds – forever.
-HANDICAP: Track how your game is trending.
-AUTO HOLE SWITCHING: Less taps, more golfs.
-SIDE GAMES: Let us do the math and keep track of those side bets. Play 9 different games like Skins, Wolf, Dots, and Points for free!
-SOCIAL FEED: Share swing videos, talk equipment, and celebrate hole-in-ones and more with other golfers from around the world.

PREMIUM FEATURES:

*Access a FREE trial after you download the app

-3D GREEN MAPS: Read putt breaks and see detailed slopes of the green for approach shots to help you hit it close.  
-CADDY+: Get personalized distance and club recommendations based on elevation, temperature, humidity, wind data  and more.
-ADVANCED STATS: Analyze your golf game with even more charts and custom filters.
-SHOT TRACKING: Our most popular feature! Track and get a snapshot of your shots based on distance, shot shape, quality, and power.
-STROKES GAINED: With strokes gained scoring, you can find out where you are losing or gaining strokes against the field – just like the pros!

LOVE THE APP?
Rate us!

SUPPORT
Don’t see your course in our database, want to learn more about our features, or just want to share your feedback? We love hearing from you, so go ahead and shoot us an email at support@18Birdies.com – and we’ll get back to you pronto.


PAYMENT INFORMATION
In addition to our free app, we offer three types of Premium membership: Weekly, Monthly and Annual.  All subscriptions and payments are offered via in-app purchase and will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as we confirm the purchase. All subscriptions auto-renew, unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of your selected subscription duration. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period, depending on the option you have selected. All subscriptions can be managed through the App Store. Note: If you upgrade to Premium before the end of your free trial, any unused portion of the trial will be forfeited. For more information, please review the 18Birdies Privacy Policy and Terms and Conditions below.

NOTE
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. But 18Birdies has a low battery mode to save your battery on the course.

TERMS OF SERVICE
https://18birdies.com/legal/terms/

GOOGLE MAPS TERMS & PRIVACY
https://www.google.com/policies/terms/
https://www.google.com/policies/privacy/

Heja is the simple and modern way to manage your sports team. It keeps everyone informed with a clear team schedule, availability RSVPs, automatic reminders, and group text messaging, including video and photo sharing.

Heja helps teams connect and grow together in a shared love for team sports. Trusted by more than 1.8 million coaches, players, parents, and volunteers worldwide!

SCHEDULE YOUR SEASON
Schedule games and practices with automatic reminders to parents and players. Heja helps you stay organized throughout the season.

TRACK PLAYER AVAILABILITY
Stay on top of who’s coming to games and practices - even if plans change. Whether someone’s sick, running late, or away, Heja keeps coaches informed and reminds players and parents to reply.

CHILD SAFEGUARDING
Safety is our top priority. Heja includes child safeguarding features to prevent adult–minor contact without a parent’s knowledge.

MESSAGING 
Send messages to individual team members, groups, or the entire team — it's up to you to decide. SEE WHO'S READ YOUR MESSAGE!

ANNOUNCEMENTS 
Cut through the noise and make sure your message reaches everyone on your team instantly.

MANAGE MULTIPLE TEAMS 
Coach or play on several teams? Heja makes it simple for coaches, parents, or players to be part of more than one team — keeping all team info in one easy-to-find place!

SHARE VIDEOS AND IMAGES
The safe and secure way to share photos of the team from practice or post strategies ahead of the game. Heja allows you to upload photos and videos directly from your pocket!

FUNDRAISING MADE SIMPLE
Create a fundraiser in minutes - no fees, no inventory, no hassle. Each player gets their own personal webshop with a goal, and supporters can shop directly from their link. As everyone tracks their progress, the team’s goal grows together. It’s simple, fast, and all in Heja.

ALL CONTACTS IN ONE PLACE
Store all the contact details for everyone on the team in one place with easy accessibility. Parents can arrange rides to practice and divide team responsibilities. Everything doesn't have to go through the coach!

FREE TO USE
That’s right. Heja is free for everyone on the team to use, with no limit to how many players and parents or guardians there are on the team.

ADVANCED FEATURES WITH HEJA PRO
Want more from Heja? Unlock Heja Pro to access attendance stats, payment tracking, unlimited admin roles, desktop access, RSVP updates, powerful reminders, and an ad-free experience for coaches and admins. It’s available through in-app purchases.

ABOUT HEJA 
We want to make it possible for every child in the world to experience the joys of team sports, from building friendships to bridging cultures and boosting health. That's what we believe in. Through Heja, we make it simple and accessible for everyone — including coaches, families, and players — to be part of a well-run sports team.

PRIVACY
More than 235,000 teams trust Heja for their internal communications. We don't take that trust lightly and care a lot about your privacy. Read our privacy policy here: https://heja.io/privacy 

Read about Heja's terms of service here: https://heja.io/terms

Registered Golf Genius players will find the free Golf Genius mobile app an exciting and useful addition to their golf experience. The app is also designed to reduce effort and save valuable time for the pro shop staff and league managers.

Here are a few of the most important app functions: (1) Live score entry out on the course (scores can be entered by players or pro staff) that immediately updates full field leaderboards on large TV displays in the clubhouse and on the app itself; (2) access to the custom member portal where players can view tee sheets, results, statistics, etc.; (3) an easy and fast way to upload photos, creating photo galleries that add to the fun for any event; (4) mobile access for club pros and league managers to all events on the golf calendar, with dates, registrants, tee sheets, hole-by-hole scorecards, final results, etc.; (5) mobile, contextual branding exposure and messaging customized for corporate and charity outings sponsors, which translates into an attractive and differentiated “outings offer” and the opportunity for clubs hosting outings to maximize revenue. 

The Golf Genius mobile app is designed for both iPhone and iPad.

developer: Ministry for Primary Industries of New Zealand
description:
Get recreational fish species information on the go with the Ministry for Primary Industries Recreational Fishing App. 

The application helps you to identify recreational fish species common in your area through images, then displays relevant information such as the minimum legal size, maximum daily limits and area bag limits. Short videos embedded within the application show how to release undersize fish correctly and also how to measure/determine the sex of crayfish. Local notices will give you updates on any temporary closures in the area.

Welcome to bet365’s most advanced sports betting app yet! Available on mobile and tablet. Download the betting app today and find out why it’s Never Ordinary at bet365.

Official Global Partner of the UEFA Champions League

Bet on a wide range of In-Play and pre-match sports including Premier League, Melbourne Cup, Big Bash and UEFA Champions League.

bet365 customers can enjoy an unrivalled user experience including:

· My Alerts: Receive tailored bet and live sports event alerts straight to your mobile or tablet.

· Personalised Display: Easily navigate to your preferred sports as our intuitive App will show you the type of sports you bet on. You can also favourite specific sports via the A-Z Sports menu for easy access.

· Search: Use our search facility to quickly find the sport, league, event or market you want to bet on.

· Sports Betting & News: Keep up to date with the very latest news across a wide range of sports and get extra betting insights from our talent and tipsters.

· bet365 Extra: View all of our available offers and promotions, including information on how your bets can qualify.

· Choose from a wide range of payment methods including Debit Card, PayPal and Apple Pay.

· Use your existing bet365 account or sign up via the app.

You must be 18 or over to have a bet365 account.

Availability may differ by location.

Tell us what you think, rate our app today!

The features listed above are available to users residing in Australia and New Zealand - availability may differ in other localities.

Please read the bet365 Privacy Policy (see link below) before installing this application. By installing and opening the application you are accepting this policy.

bet365 is committed to Responsible Gambling.
We have a range of tools available that are designed to help you to stay in control of your betting such as Time-Outs, Deposit Limits, Reality Checks, Self-Exclusion and others.

WHAT ARE YOU PREPARED TO LOSE TODAY?

MarineMate is a smartphone app that allows you to access information on tide times, boat ramp locations, VHF channels, marine reserves and local boating rules wherever you go in New Zealand, all at the palm of your hand.
Oceans, rivers lakes. Always bring your mate!

Tide info
Access information on tide times.

VHF channels
Stay connected and find the local VHF channel.

Marine reserves
Find the marine reserves and their rules and permitted activities.

Customary management areas
Find Mātaitai and Tāiāpure, their rules and permited activities.

Safety checklist
A handy list to help you pack your essentials.

Notices and local boating info
Up-to-date info about local events and boating rules for wherever you go.

Boat ramp locations
Find boat ramps and useful information about them.

A link to the NZ Fishing Rules App.

Download the official UFC app today and unlock the ultimate combat sports experience—live fights, historic battles, and exclusive content, all in one place.

SmoothSwing
• The Only Shot Tracer That Works Like Magic!
• The Original 360 Golf GPS ™

► SHOT TRACER

• World's First Real-Time Shot Tracer!

• Must use white color golf balls.

• Exposure to direct sunlight on a hot day for a long period of time can eventually cause device to become warm.

UNSUPPORTED DEVICES
*iPhone8, *iPhone 8 Plus, *iPhone X

► GOLF GPS

• Club Assistant

Set how far you hit each club in your bag. Every time you zoom in Club Assistant shows you where you should expect the ball to end up for each club (based on the PLAYS LIKE Distance).

• PLAYS LIKE Distance

PLAYS LIKE Distance provides a measurement which compensates for uphill and downhill shots. (PLAYS LIKE Distance is also known as Slope Adjusted Distance.)

• ↑/↓ Elevation Change

↑/↓ Elevation Change provides a measurement of the vertical distance, up or down, from where you are standing to the target.

Terms Of Service
https://www.smoothswingapp.com/terms-of-service

Privacy Policy

TeamReach has everything you need to manage and instantly communicate with your team, club, or group. It's EASY, INTUITIVE, SAFE and FREE!

• MESSAGES - TeamReach saves you time and reduces confusion by serving as a central place for all team communications.
• SCHEDULES - No more guessing when and where games and practices are taking place. Includes reminders, maps and forecast.
• INSTANT UPDATES - Immediately notify your team of last minute changes: game time, location, cancellation, uniform, and more.
• AVAILABILITY - Easily find out who can attend a game, practice or special event by sending out an availability request to the group.
• EVENT DETAILS - Everyone will know the time, place, driving directions, forecast, and attendees.
• POLLS - Get instant team input on restaurants, practice times, hotels, gear, etc.
• PHOTOS - Conveniently view, share, and download photos in one place.
• SAFE - It’s an easy way for coaches, players, and parents to communicate safely without exchanging texts, emails, or phone calls.

 - Free, Easy, & Saves Time
TeamReach is designed to simplify life for everyone involved. Managers and coaches can create teams in seconds, and parents or players can easily join by entering a group code. The team has a central place for all communication, and this eliminates the need for phone calls, emails, and handouts. 

- Safe, Protects Coaches, Players & Parents
It's a safe way for coaches, players, and parents to communicate without exchanging contact information. Players do not have access to the coach's number and the coach does not have access to a players' number. It's an easy way to protect everyone and keep the conversation in one place.

- Right Place, Right Time
In a nutshell, we help the team be at the right place at the right time. Players and parents get notified of any schedule changes. Also, the coach or team manager can send out any last minute notifications including: change in location, weather delay, game time, cancellation, uniform color, and more.

- Great for Any Sport
The TeamReach App is perfect to reach out and communicate with all types of sports teams and leagues including: Soccer, Basketball, Volleyball, Baseball, Football, Pickleball, Track & Field, Skating, Diving, Cycling, Running, Skiing, Fencing, Sailing, Bowling, Ice Hockey, Badminton, Athletics, Softball, Cheerleading, Water Polo, Gymnastics, Equestrian, Martial Arts, Swim, Rowing, Spirit Squad, Rugby, Field Hockey, Wrestling, Golf, Cross Country, Cricket, Lacrosse, Tennis, and more. 
  
- Perfect for Any Club, Group, or Activity
TeamReach isn't just for sports management. It's a great App for any group, club, or activity including: Boy Scouts, Girl Scouts, YMCA, Church & Faith Group, Camp, PTO, School, Dance Class, Band, Student Association, Family, Student Government, Charity Group, Fraternity, Sorority, Nonprofit Organization, Book Club, Study Group, Rotary Club, Volunteer Group, Key Club, United Way Chapter, Day Care, and Alumni Associations. Keep it simple for your group and reach out with messages, instant notifications, schedule of meetings, and easily remind everyone of an important event. 

Get Started Today! It's EASY, INTUITIVE, SAFE and FREE.

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

SwingU is the top-performing, free golf GPS rangefinder & scorecard app in the world, with more than 7 million users around the globe!

The SwingU app is FREE FOR LIFE and extremely accurate, reliable, and battery-efficient – rivaling any other golf GPS app or expensive golf GPS handheld or watch on the market!

WHAT YOU GET WHEN YOU DOWNLOAD

• Digital scorecard that easily tracks your score & putts and auto advances hole-to-hole

• Daily golf instruction tip from our team of top-100 instructors
• Apple Watch – get distances and keep score for you and your friends

WHY DO MILLIONS OF GOLFERS USE OUR APP?
• Reliable and easy to use – one tap and you’re playing
• Constantly improving with new functionality and new technology
• Commitment to user satisfaction with quick, reliable customer service

UPGRADE TO PLUS FOR A COMPLETE DIGITAL CADDIE EXPERIENCE

• Enhanced scorecard & stats – record your score, putts, driver accuracy, bunker play, and penalty tracking and get detailed round summaries revealing strengths and weaknesses
• On-the-course games – handicap-adjusted scoring including Stroke Play, Skins, Stableford, Match Play, Nassau & Syndicates

UPGRADE TO PRO FOR ELITE GOLFER PERFORMANCE & TRAINING

• Post-round #1 game-improvement priority, revealing where you should focus your practice time

Discover Playtomic, the app that connects you with an ever-growing community of over 1 million players of padel, tennis, and other racket sports. Enjoy a unique experience with our intuitive and easy-to-use app, which was designed with you in mind.

Find like-minded players in our padel community. Whether you already have friends to play with or are just looking for new partners, Playtomic offers you the chance to connect with people from your club or other padel clubs nearby. What’s more, you can receive personalized recommendations and follow players in your community. The idea is to connect, play and have fun in a social setting! You can also chat with your playing partners and follow their progress too.

Easily organize your perfect match. Create private matches at your favorite padel club or an indoor padel court. Make them public so that other players can join in the fun or you can even join in with an already active match. You have total control over how you play. And if you need help booking a padel court, don’t worry. Playtomic has a wide network of padel clubs and over 16,000 courts worldwide, both indoor and outdoor. You can book a court that suits your needs and wishes. In addition, you will have the option to pay the court fees in full yourself or split them with the other players. A padel court can be yours in the blink of an eye!

If you’re looking for exciting padel leagues and tournaments, Playtomic is the place for you. Show off your talent, improve your game, climb the rankings, and have fun, all while meeting new players and checking out new clubs. It’s the ideal opportunity to grow as a player and dive into the passionate world of padel.

On Playtomic, you can easily and quickly keep track of your progress. Although advanced stats are available with our Premium subscription, even with a free account you can see basic data, such as matches played, won and lost, as well as your recent matches and results. If you want to take your experience to the next level, you can go Premium and unlock all of the exclusive functions.



///////////////////////////// UNLIMITED PREMIUM EXPERIENCE /////////////////////////////

Once you join Premium, you can enjoy a limitless experience. Save money on every transaction and avoid additional court booking fees. Furthermore, you will receive personalized priority alerts. You will be able to select which notifications you want to receive according to your preferences so that you stay up to date on matches, courts, and last-minute opportunities. Your time is money, and it is valuable to us too!

Effectively promote your matches and attract other padel players. Both matches that you create and those that you join will be marked as “Gold Matches”, which will allow other players to easily find them and join in the fun. And to make sure that you always find an available court, we will assign one to you immediately. Pretty cool, no?

Make the most of your performance data and get advanced padel stats. Check out detailed info on your performance, matches, sets, and other interesting metrics. Track your best winning streak, identify your most challenging opponent, and compare your performance with other padel players. 

Challenge yourself, improve your performance, and enjoy the full Playtomic experience. Subscribe now and don’t miss another exciting opportunity in the world of padel!
